text: "Hammer Horror" is a 1978 by English singer-songwriter Kate Bush and is the leading single from her second studio album Lionheart. It went to number 44 in the United Kingdom, number 10 in Ireland, number 17 in Australia, number 21 in New Zealand and number 25 in the Netherlands. ==Track listing== All tracks written and composed by Kate Bush. 7" vinyl # "Hammer Horror" – 4:38 # "Coffee Homeground" – 3:39 7" vinyl (Japan) # "Hammer Horror" – 4:15 # "Coffee Homeground" – 3:39 ==References== Category:1978 songs Category:Kate Bush songs Category:Glam rock songs Category:Art rock songs Category:Baroque pop songs
title: Hammer Horror (song)
